title: Gluten free lemon drizzle cake (The naughty version)
ingredients: ['170g (6 oz) butter, softened', '280g (10 oz) caster sugar', '3 eggs, separated', '6 tablespoons milk', '2 lemons, divided', '280g (10 oz) polenta (fine cornmeal)', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '4 tablespoons icing sugar', '2 to 3 tablespoons gin']
